      • getTopProjects

        public static PublicTopData getTopProjects(PublicReportFormParameters config,
                                           java.lang.Integer count,
                                           java.lang.Integer months)
        Retrieves top 'count' projects based on fixed requirements.
        NOTE: the requirement is fixed at the moment, however we may need to provide some flexibility => JsonBean config can be used for that
        Parameters:
        config - - report config
        count - - the maximum number of results to retrieve
        Returns:
        JsonBean object with results
